Adafruit GFX (vendor placeholder)

Place Adafruit GFX library sources here if you intend to vendor the library.
Recommended layout:
- main/third_party/adafruit_gfx/Adafruit_GFX.cpp
- main/third_party/adafruit_gfx/Adafruit_GFX.h

If you vendor Adafruit GFX, update `main/third_party/roboeyes/CMakeLists.txt` or `main/CMakeLists.txt` to compile the sources.
